mapper.insert: insert into score (score_point, record_time, drom_id, room_id) values ( #{scorePoint,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{recordTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{drom.dromId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{room.roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select score_id, score_point, record_time, drom_id, room_id from score
